credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Zloto [Gold]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On gold background, appearing as irregular spots, fragmentary blue-toned photograph of a man's face. At mid-left, in green, the title "ZLOTO". At lower center, the credits in smaller type.
name: Poster
